attributes.action: Stop Muslim Activists Dictating what happens in our country
attributes.additional_details:
To start, I am in no way racist, I welcome people from other countries to our borders to help them make their life better.

What is really getting on my nerves is when muslim groups wish to force their way of life from their country on us in the UK.

We as british people eat pork, ham, meat. I disagree with these groups "demanding" that food outlets have halal only options. I am all for these people to have their own beliefs and if they wish they should have a halal "option" but my beliefs and needs are just as important as theirs.

If i walk into a subway / KFC i want to be able to have ham, bacon pork products if i choose too. They shouldnt be allowed to force the UK government to put pressure on companies to remove these products.

Please sign to get our god given right to eat pork put back on menus across the UK. As i said im all for them having the option of halal but why should we then miss out on pork when we want it???
